Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: they are both very good i prefer to use a teacher because the it is easier to get a greater understanding of what it going on however they often arent available and so i use AI to give me and understanding even if i cant grasp it fully or dont know how to get AI to explain it in a way i understand

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from teachers makes me feel i understand it better and i trust their judgement much more however that kind of help isn't always availbe so i use AI but i often check it with other sources and dont always fully understand or trust it.
